On every instance creation a new  rule is pre-pended to ebtables that drops ARP packets from the bridge input.
 This causes a routing problem. Please look at the details in AskOpenStack link above.

comments.content:
In my test environment, ebtables rules are not added in the compute node when a new instance is created.

The above link suggests that the issue was caused by using nova-network with --share-address T, but without the correct physical networking setup to use this combination.

Please provide reproduction steps; the link has a large amount of what I think is spurious information, but it's difficult to identity what the actual issue is.
